DOC.brief_summary: This 24-week , one arm , open-label , interventional , non-comparative multicenter study evaluate lipid change HIV infect woman hyperlipidemia boost PI base regimen switch boost PI raltegravir standard dosage 400mg twice daily . This study aim study effect metabolic profile switch hyperlipidemic HIV infect woman PI base regimen raltegravir .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Lipids Lipoproteins HIV Infected Women After Switch From Protease Inhibitor Raltegravir
DOC.criteria: Documented HIV1 infection female patient , age ≥18 year Patients receive antiretroviral therapy consist least 2 antiretroviral agent protease inhibitor plus ritonavirboosted protease inhibitor ( PI ) least previous 6 month Plasma HIV viral load < 50 copies/ml current boost PI contain regimen ≥ 6 month prior study entry Fasting LDL cholesterol > 130 mg/dl Fasting triglycerides < 450 mg/dl History virological failure previous antiretroviral therapy
